MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G74 and G76 postcode areas of Glasgow, Thornton Hall, Clarkston and East Kilbride, affecting properties in Macneill Drive and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have repaired a fault on our overhead line network near Stewartfield Way and we now expect your supply to be restored by 9.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:05pm on Wednesday, 04 November 2020
